channel.title: loyola university chicago on Tella
channel.description: Recent content in loyola university chicago on Tella

item.title: Multi-Layer Perceptron
item.description: This workshop is on the multi-layer perceptron. This is meant as an introduction into neual networks. An example involving the Titanic dataset will be developed by the end of the session.

item.title: Dr. Greg Matthews: Data Visualization
item.description: Dr. Greg Matthews is the Directory of the Data Science Program at Loyola University Chicago.

item.title: Dr. Steven Platt: Intro to AI
item.description: Dr. Steven Platt is a Director of Analytics and Lecturer of Analytics and AI at Loyola University Chicago’s Quinlan School of Business.
